title: LF Duo (silver/gold elo) (any role)

embed.description: combat / Silver 1 43LP / 73W 68L Win Ratio 52% / Vi - 61W 50L Win Ratio 55%, Neeko - 3W 2L Win Ratio 60%, Nocturne - 2W 1L Win Ratio 67%, Diana - 1W 2L Win Ratio 33%, Pantheon - 2W 0L Win Ratio 100%

body:
I was high plat 2 years ago, but had a long break because I got sick of the game, I main jungle and I am looking for a decent duo partner, having trouble winning with team mates who refuse to push the advantage and end the game.   



You must be able to play safe, I gank a lot, and the better you can keep the wave in the middle of the lane, the more fed I can get you. I main {{champion:254}}  but I can play other junglers well too. I prefer if my duo plays someone with good CC so we can get easy kills.

replies.body: hey im also looking for a duo, if you are still interested. i can play top or mid.
